attributes.action: To bring the double jeopardy law to Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see the same double jeopardy law that is in force brought to Scotland so that with new evidence people can be tried again for the crime they have committed!

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
